headline: AI Team Lead | Sr Data scientist | Data science consultant
summary:
I believe the more you sweat during What and Why ( understanding and defining) while solving AI problems, the less you bleed during How ( Development and Execution).

Machine learning and Artificial intelligence (AI) professional with 9+ years of Industry experience in Deep Learning, Data Science, Business Analytics, Management Consulting, Product Management and Software development. I'm currently leading AI Team at Venturit Inc, a Michigan-based AI company. This team is responsible for client AI projects, Company AI products and building innovative AI case studies. 

I've worn many hats during my tenure of a professional career -  Co-founder, Consultant, Product Owner, Team Lead, Analyst, Innovation Expert, and Software Engineer. As a result, I have a unique ability to adapt myself according to any situation and requirement.

I can help organisations with AI transformation. Convert a Business idea into a successful AI product. 

Now, with an amalgamation of my technical and managerial capabilities along with my past experience, I'm confident to navigate complex challenges. But my actual experience has taught me that my professional value boils down to the following:


- I believe in work ethics, responsibility, team spirit
- I love to take challenges and can work in any circumstance, how hard it can be.
- It doesn't matter who'll get the credit; I only try to win.
- I love automating things using AI/ML.
- Data science and AI are fun for me. If you have anything about this, I'm available 24/7.
- I'm calm and composed.
- I have new ideas and know how to execute them.
- Make mistakes faster, correct them and never repeat them.
- It's a team who wins, not you.

Technical & Functional capabilities:
Business Analytics, Statistical Analysis and Data Mining, Consulting, Growth hacking, Data Visualization, Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence (Structured & unstructured - Text, Image & Video, Signal), Customer & People Analytics, A Product Development

Technology strongholds:
Python, Sklearn, NLTK, Spacy, TensorFlow, Keras, Cloud ( AWS, AZURE, GCP), PyTorch, Open source ML, DL and NLP library.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.description:
Working closely with CEO to convert various business ideas into reality. Developing a Proof of concept on various AI use cases to generate new business leads. Working very closely with the Senior team for complete AI Transformation. 

Build a state of art Arrhythmia prediction Machine learning model with a 99% sensitivity score. Our model is competing with Apple Watch and under USFDA approval process.

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description:
Rayon is your friendly radiation expert
RF radiation sources like cell phones, WiFi routers, and Bluetooth are a part of our way of life today, and it is hard to track our exposure. Its proprietary algorithm learns from your past recording of symptoms based on your level of exposure and duration. 

Now you can track your exposure to RF radiation and symptoms with Rayon.

experiences.description: Friend Venture on Disaster control and Global Hunger Removal (Selected by United Nations in World Food Program). Sharing my knowledge and views as and when required!

experiences.company: Predict Disease - Artificial Intelligence based Healthcare Assistant
experiences.title: Co-Founder and Sr Data Scientist
experiences.description:
Predict Disease is a healthcare analytics platform that is driven by artificial intelligence and machine learning, to assist patients and primary care physicians by measuring the potential risk of any chronic disease that starts with minor symptoms. The platform leverages data from lifestyle activities, social media/website forums, research papers, medical articles and outcomes, and family history, matching these with known signs/symptoms and other demographic characteristics for the early detection of the chronic disease. The main objective is to identify high-risk patients that are more likely to develop the chronic disease during regular body checkups/primary care visits and then help primary care physicians to provide insights and personalized recommendations on reducing the risk and preventing or delaying the disease.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

We built a statistical model through training of historical web articles, manually tagged or untagged by data scientists and business users. The model uses NLP based artificial intelligence to identify rumors. , Covered 25+ websites and 300+ web source of print media and Social media platforms.

experiences.title: NLP - Software Engineer  ( Now E42.ai )
experiences.description:
Handling Bigdata, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine learning stuff for NLP based auto answering system. System is NLP based search engine, which is aimed to provide instant answer for any search query made by user.

LEA (LightAnswers & Expert Advice) uses Natural Language Processing and AI Bots to figure out your text chat/questions and process it to search for precise usable answers and advice. At times if the information you are looking for is not available (from any reliable source) LEA contacts real world experts to help you. You can even chat with the experts to drill deeper till you get what you are looking for

Worked on different modules like query analysis, query correction, Domain classification, NER detection, subject object detection, answer type detection, query breaking, coreference detection.

accomplishment_projects.title: Machine Translation (Hindi < - > English  Translation)
accomplishment_projects.description:
Machine translation, sometimes referred to by the abbreviation MT is a sub-field of computational linguistics that investigates the use of software to translate text or speech from one language to another.

We are trying to build our own MT tool for Asia's biggest Stock Exchange to monitor regional news which influence the stock price.

We are using Neural machine translation (NMT), which is an approach to machine translation that uses a large neural network. It departs from phrase-based statistical translation approaches that use separately engineered subcomponents. Google and Microsoft translation services now use NMT. Google uses Google Neural Machine Translation (GNMT) in preference to its previous statistical methods.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

accomplishment_projects.title: Data analytics-based, Artificial Intelligence mechanism to detect rumours in Stock market
accomplishment_projects.description:
This is Data analytics-based, artificial intelligence mechanism that tracks the performance of listed companies in relation to news about those companies on 30+ digital media platform and social media platforms, like Twitter and Facebook

The primary objective of the verification is that the mechanism will detect and mitigate potential risks of market manipulation, rumour, and reduce information asymmetry arising from digital media platforms, including from social media.

We built a statistical model through training of historical web articles, manually tagged or untagged by data scientists and business users. The model uses NLP based artificial intelligence to identify rumors. It is enriched with 5K+ company names using the n-gram technique, filtration of 80 suspected and 20 rejection keywords, 25+ websites and 300+ web source integrations. This is a continuous process, and involves adding the company list, keywords and web links slowly and steadily to ensure maximum accuracy. 
            

    
    

    
        Show less

accomplishment_projects.title: Auto answering system
accomplishment_projects.description:
Aim is to process large dataset and creating auto answering which should provide exact expected answer in instant.
Main tasks -

Data classification, Domain detection, Query understanding, 
Word sense disambiguation, Co-reference resolution, NER+Focus+Answer type detection, Answer processing 

Key tools and technology - 
- Natural language processing (NLP), Machine learning 
- Python , pylinkgrammar, swi-prolog
- Hadoop, Apache lucene, solr and other helping apache packages
- NLTK, scikit learn, Stanford nlp package (pos, ner, co-reference resolution, sentence parsing etc)

            

    
    

    
        Show less

System uses machine learning classifier with large dbpedia datasets along with other curated datasets.

accomplishment_projects.title: Open Volunteer Grid(OVG) system
accomplishment_projects.description:
This project is aimed to bring commercialization in the work of Volunteer Grid system. Currently available Volunteer systems are purely research and academia based, like B.O.I.N.C.
Our system's goal is to attract volunteer CPU power contributor from all over the world and they get paid as per the idle CPU power they have contributed.

accomplishment_projects.title: Telescope Auto Guiding system
accomplishment_projects.description: This project was aimed to provide auto guiding system for windows based machine for the telescope located at Mount Abu Infrared Observatory of Indian Astronomical Department of Physical Research Laboratory.

accomplishment_projects.title: Packet sniffer and analyzer
accomplishment_projects.description: This software is based on sniffing different types of network packets like TCP, UDP, ICMP, ARP from network. Extracting all the filed of these packets and getting network information. This project was implemented using core JAVA.

accomplishment_projects.title: AI based Auto answering system for Texas Education Consultative Service
accomplishment_projects.description:
Developing AI based system which can handle FAQs and similar question related to Educational service in Texas which is providing fully-integrated solutions that enhance educational outcomes by providing reliable information, improved processes and superior compliance with local, state, and federal guidelines.

Using Machine learning, NLP concepts, FuzzyWuzzy string matching algorithm, Artificial Intelligence Markup Language (AIML) for processing the question and getting answer.
